findings.title: 51% Attack Vulnerability
findings.description: An attacker could control more than half of the computing power on a proof-of-work (PoW) blockchain, allowing them to reverse transactions, block new transactions, and deny service.

findings.title: Denial of Service (DoS) attacks
findings.description: A DoS attack could flood the network or system with traffic, disrupting its normal operations.

findings.title: Smart contract vulnerabilities
findings.description: Smart contracts can contain bugs or vulnerabilities that could be exploited by attackers.

findings.title: Wallet vulnerabilities
findings.description: Ethereum wallets can be vulnerable to hacking or other types of cyber attacks.
